trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around December 31st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was observing the rising full moon, immediately below but off to the right of the moon there appeared to be a darker place which was like a circular void. Within that void a large X of light appeared. That X started to spin, and as it spun a lit cloud tube extended from the place where the void across the sky to the right of the point of origin. At the point where the black void started and where the tube started a tiny blip of light came out, which moved out a distance from the point of origin and then disappeared. The tube started to fade, but continued to seem un-naturally lit for about 3 minutes as it shortened. It did not flow away like a cloud, the sky was perfectly clear and this appeared to be way above the atmosphere. It had entirely disappeared within 5 minutes.
